import React from 'react'; import Rating from '../Components/Rating/Rating.js' import Data from '../Data.js'; import './ProductScreen.css'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = Data.Products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Rs. {product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    Rs. {product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); }
